content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of a stone furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5).

### Pipe Groups
Consists of multiple pipe groups for fluid transport:
- PipeGroup (fluid system=37756, position=-18.5, 16.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system=37759, position=-12.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system=37760, position=-8.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system=37762, position=-10.5, 22.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system=37763, position=-7.5, 23.5)

### Electric Poles
Consists of multiple small electric poles providing power:
- Small electric pole (position -16.5, 19.5)
- Small electric pole (position -16.5, 20.5)
- Small electric pole (position -16.5, 21.5)
- Small electric pole (position -15.5, 19.5)
- Small electric pole (position -19.5, 22.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure that the recipe for the item you are trying to craft is enabled and that you have the required crafting machine or furnace operational.
- Verify that you have sufficient resources in the furnace or crafting machine before attempting to craft items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
